title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 214.6 - Power of clerks to administer oaths and perform certain other duties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 214.6 - Power of clerks to administer oaths and perform certain other duties

State Regulations

The court clerk and one of the deputy or
assistant court clerks designated by the clerk are authorized and empowered to
administer oaths, take acknowledgments, sign the process or mandate of the
court and certify the records of the court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
214.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
